additional_data.description: The spirit of a legendary Geatish hero who had the strength to topple a giant, become king, and then stab a dragon. Yamata-no-Orochi cursed him to be eternally young, but he likes being a child again. His kingly speech and behavior never ceases to surprise those around him. They're doubly shocked by his extensive wisdom and strength, which extends far beyond his apparent age.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 17/8/16 - 7/9/16
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 4/9/16 - 7/9/16
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increase battle time limit by 15% during the "Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" event.
◦ Summon rate increased 17/8/16 - 7/9/16

summon: "I'll help out any way I can!"
